Description: Best selling products by total sales
Formula:
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE BestSellingProducts AS
SELECT 
    ProductID,
    SUM(Sales) AS TotalSales
FROM 
    SalesFact
GROUP BY 
    ProductID
ORDER BY 
    TotalSales DESC
LIMIT 5;

Description: Average price for best selling products over a time
Formula:
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE AvgPriceDynamics AS
SELECT 
    sf.ProductID,
    DATE_FORMAT(sf.OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month,
    AVG(sf.Sales / sf.Quantity) AS AvgPrice
FROM 
    SalesFact sf
JOIN 
    BestSellingProducts bsp
ON 
    sf.ProductID = bsp.ProductID
GROUP BY 
    sf.ProductID, DATE_FORMAT(sf.OrderDate, '%Y-%m');

Description: Dynamics of avg price for best-selling products
Formula:
SELECT 
    ProductID,
    Month,
    AvgPrice
FROM 
    AvgPriceDynamics
ORDER BY 
    ProductID, Month;

Description: Total sales for a state datewise
Formula:
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE SalesByState AS
SELECT 
    State,
    DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m') AS Month,
    SUM(Sales) AS TotalSales
FROM 
    SalesFact
GROUP BY 
    State, DATE_FORMAT(OrderDate, '%Y-%m');

SELECT 
    State,
    Month,
    TotalSales
FROM 
    SalesByState
ORDER BY 
    State, Month;

Description: Total sales for each customer in every segment
Formula:
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE TotalSalesByCustomer AS
SELECT 
    Segment,
    CustomerID,
    SUM(Sales) AS TotalSales
FROM 
    SalesFact
GROUP BY 
    Segment, CustomerID;

WITH RankedCustomers AS (
    SELECT 
        Segment,
        CustomerID,
        TotalSales,
        RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY Segment ORDER BY TotalSales DESC) AS Rank
    FROM 
        TotalSalesByCustomer
)
SELECT 
    Segment,
    CustomerID,
    TotalSales,
    Rank
FROM 
    RankedCustomers
WHERE 
    Rank = 1;

Description: Total sale for every product in every state
Formula:
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE TotalSales AS
SELECT 
    State,
    ProductID,
    SUM(Sales) AS TotalSales
FROM 
    SalesFact
GROUP BY 
    State, ProductID;

Description: Top/Bottom products according to sales by state
Formula:
WITH RankedProducts AS (
    SELECT 
        State,
        ProductID,
        TotalSales,
        RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY State ORDER BY TotalSales DESC) AS RankDesc,
        RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY State ORDER BY TotalSales ASC) AS RankAsc
    FROM 
        TotalSales
)
SELECT 
    State,
    ProductID,
    TotalSales,
    RankAsc,
    RankDesc
FROM 
    RankedProducts
WHERE 
    RankAsc = 1 OR RankDesc = 1;

CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE DeliveryTimeCalc AS
SELECT 
    OrderID,
    ProductID,
    State,
    DATEDIFF(ShipDate, OrderDate) AS DeliveryTime
FROM 
    SalesFact;

Description: Average delivery time against each product
Formula:
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE AvgDeliveryTime AS
SELECT 
    State,
    ProductID,
    AVG(DeliveryTime) AS AvgDeliveryTime
FROM 
    DeliveryTimeCalc
GROUP BY 
    State, ProductID;

Description: Top/Bottom products according to avg delivery time by state.
Formula:
WITH RankedProducts AS (
    SELECT 
        State,
        ProductID,
        AvgDeliveryTime,
        RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY State ORDER BY AvgDeliveryTime ASC) AS RankAsc,
        RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY State ORDER BY AvgDeliveryTime DESC) AS RankDesc
    FROM 
        AvgDeliveryTime
)
SELECT 
    State,
    ProductID,
    AvgDeliveryTime,
    RankAsc,
    RankDesc
FROM 
    RankedProducts
WHERE 
    RankAsc = 1 OR RankDesc = 1;
